dmca.title: Reporting cosplay-cutie.net - violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 


  _____  

From: Sachiko [mailto:happysaber@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 20, 2005 6:06 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Reporting cosplay-cutie.net - violation


Hello,

I would like to report the domain cosplay-cutie.net
<http://cosplay-cutie.net/> , a domain registered at Newsmediaexpress.com. I
used whois.sc to trace down its IP Address, and it has led me to
Theplanet.com. I have reported it to NewsMediaExpress, but they said that
they only handle trademark copyright infringement on the domain name. They
told me to report to the service provider that hosting "cosplay-cutie.net"
as the files and data is reside on their server. It is the reason why I am
contacting Theplanet.com right now.

http://www.whois.sc/cosplay-cutie.net

This website has stolen property from another site, claiming as her own.
Contacting the owner of the domain is useless, because she is denying her
theft. She claims to be "Gingko", but she is not the real person! The
content on her site - photos - belongs to http://www.pbase.com/gingko/gp
(real Gingko from HK) and http://www.fotop.net/ginglo/ginglo05 (this site
belongs to Simon Ho, one of the real Gingko's photographers). BOTH of those
claims that cosplay-cutie.net does NOT belong to them! Not only did she
steal the photos, but also she stole Gingko's identity and pretend to be
her, and she is accusing the real Gingko as the thief. 

On the personal level, I have in fact witnessed this exact same person doing
the exact same thing - stealing photos and identities, which is why I am
particularly paranoid about her getting away with it. Cosplay-cutie.net has
promoted herself so much on the web (this includes
http://www.myspace.com/gingko_chan and every single webring she has joined),
that other people believe she is the real person when the truth is that she
is NOT.

I have started a petition that listed every single proof I found that
distinguish cosplay-cutie.net from the pbase.com/gingko, and I hope it is
sufficient enough information: http://petitiononline.com/gingkopb/. Please
read it thoroughly even though they are not really organized or neatly
stated, because I have listed every detail there. I did nit-pick the little
details.

If the screenshots aren't good enough proof, how about this?  I used
whois.net to look into the registered data of cosplay-cutie.net (I do that
only if necessary, of course), and she registered to be from HongKong, which
is what she claims to be from in her website as well. HOWEVER, the Phone #
registered under the domain is +654.978685454. There's no country with a
country code of 654. 654 is not a country code to any country. That right
there can get her into trouble. False information at register. 

The country code for Hong Kong is 852 (reference source
<http://kropla.com/dialcode.htm> ). (Notice that if you only do 65, it shows
that to be Singapore instead of Hong Kong.) The other fishy thing about it
is, HK phone numbers have 8 digit. Cosplay-cutie.net put in 9.  I went to
cosplay-cutie and read the what-so-called "profile". 

She said she lives in Hong Kong, but she's born in Canada. Canada and US
have a country code of 1. HK, like I said, 852. I've also been tracking down
her I.P, which is bbcache-##.singnet.com.sg (## being the changing digits).

I hope the proofs are sufficient enough. Thank you for taking the time to
read this compiliation of inquiry, and I hope I have convinced the service
to take action about cosplay-cutie.net. Please have the account suspended,
or even better, terminated, because I truly do not wish to see people
believing her when she is stealing someone else's identity and property!

If something will be done, please reply back to me. If you are going to
report to cosplay-cutie.net, please keep me anonymous. Thank you so much
again!



~*~
Love, (k.a) Sachiko 
http://promised-dream.net


"There are many things that we would throw away if we were not afraid that
others might pick them up." ~ Oscar Wilde

__________________________________________________

Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
http://mail.yahoo.com
